entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
